segments.text: Good morning , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to American breakfast with fried eggs sunny side up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of juice do you prefer , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Breakfast juice and please make my coffee very strong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , sir . American breakfast with fried eggs sunny side up . Breakfast juice and black coffee . And my correct , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , sir . I ’ Ve got breakfast your ordered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just put it on the table please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you need anything else , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thanks . Oh , yes , could I have some juice for the mini bar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of juice do you like sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . I ’ ll get them for you right away . Would you please sign this bill first ? Thank you , sir .
segments.speaker: S1
